level.heading: Nonliability of corporation and transfer agent.
level.text: A corporation or transfer agent does not incur liability to any person by making a transfer or otherwise acting in a manner authorized by this chapter.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Act for Simplification of Fiduciary Security Transfers. See 7C Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
